name: Gangster Racing
description:
Welcome to the time of gangsters and the first night street racing!

Gangsters Racing is our third racing game. Bigger and more elaborate than anything else what we have created for you.

Large open city waiting for you. The city is created on the historical materials in which you can move freely between the races. You will drive a elaborate period cars from 30s to 50s.

Look forward to:
-many different races
-large open city
-period cars
-period music.

The game doesn't have ingame payments like other games, you pay once and get all the content, no more extra money!

Thank you for your purchase and have a good fun.

Game tips:
-keep on your mind, that the game takes place at night, we recommend setting higher brightness on your display
-in the menu you can separately turn off the music and sound
-you can leave race by pressing the END RACE button.
